descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Miles Bridges glides through the paint and finishes with the smooth finger roll for the Hornets.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Miles Bridges hits the bucket vs. Oklahoma City Thunder) 2022/01/22 ESHEET

videos.headline: Miles Bridges is smooth as silk with this finger roll finish

videos.description: Gordon Hayward pulls up and drains the and-1 to extend the Hornets' lead.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Gordon Hayward with the and-1 bucket) 2022/01/22 ESHEET

videos.headline: Gordon Hayward gets the bucket and the foul

videos.description: Kelly Oubre takes it behind his back and somehow gets the and-1 to fall for the Hornets.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Kelly Oubre Jr. knocks down shot) 2022/01/22 ESHEET

videos.headline: Kelly Oubre fights through his defender and gets the and-1 to fall

videos.description: Terry Rozier gathers the rock on the fast break and drains the and-1 to extend the Hornets' lead before halftime.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Terry Rozier drains the and-1 for a chance at a 4-point play) 2022/01/21 ESHEET

videos.headline: Terry Rozier drains the and-1 for a chance at a 4-point play

videos.description: Plumlee soars through the paint and throws down the lob from LaMelo to extend the Hornets' lead.
videos.headline: LaMelo lobs a beauty to Plumlee for the alley-oop
